Description: White hand-sewn bow tie made of 100% silk. The bow tie is pre-tied and easy to fasten around the neck with an adjustable strap that fits all neck measurements up to 52 cm in circumference. As we work without intermediaries, we can offer a bow tie of the highest quality at a reasonable price. The size of the bow tie is 12.5 x 6 cm. Swedish design. Delivered in an elegant velvet pouch.

White self-tie bow tie from Scottsberry, hand-sewn in the finest silk. With a focus on quality and functionality, this is an affordable bow tie that you tie yourself. It has an adjustable strap that fits all neck sizes up to a 50 cm circumference. The strap can be opened, making it easy to put on and take off the bow tie without having to untie it. Swedish design. Comes in an elegant velvet pouch.
